name: Moog Memories
description:
Moog Memories is an interactive song where you add instruments, delay them, and apply effects. There is no other goal but to find pleasant arrangements and enjoying the melody.

The composition is a tribute to the musician Jean-Jacques Perrey. Some sounds are samples from his album The Amazing New Electronic Pop Sound of Jean-Jacques Perrey. (But if you're curious about the artist, I highly recommend Moog Mig Mag Moog).

This game was made over a week-end as an entry for the Music Game Jam 2017. Source code is available on github.
